basic_info.description: Experienced Data Collector with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in HTML, Data Analytics, Teamwork, Bootstrap, and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). Strong accounting professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services from University of Washington. An innovative problem-solver passionate about developing apps, my current focus is on development and security. Since completing the bootcamp, I have continued my studies independently to learn more about server-back end functions and data storage.

projects.title: Puzzled
projects.description: A website designed for users to create, manage, and solve puzzles. The project was built with the collaboration of my team members and culminations of skills developed throughout the bootcamp. It has a authentication and user profile creation system that allows users to securely manage their uploaded puzzles or puzzles they have favorited from other users.

projects.title: Cookify
projects.description: A website designed with two API’s incorporated to fill the fundamental usage that if a user desires to use a specific recipe, they can use the site to find the ingredients in their local store under the Kroger umbrella.

projects.title: DEVxp
projects.description: An interactive learning platform that provides a space for new and experienced coders to practice and develop coding skills. The website currently provides notecards and prompts the user with multiple choice questions related to the topic of their choosing. In future development the website will integrate a leveling system to track the user’s experience and reflect their knowledge.
